headline: Labour’s North Sea ban is damaging business, says ExxonMobil
summary: Energy giant ExxonMobil has accused Labour of damaging British business by banning new oil and gas drilling in the North Sea.

raw.headline: Labour’s North Sea ban is damaging business, says ExxonMobil
raw.summary: Energy giant ExxonMobil has accused Labour of damaging British business by banning new oil and gas drilling in the North Sea.

headline: Chevron & Exxon Eye Lukoil's Global Assets in High-Stakes Pivot
summary: CVX and XOM are racing to capture strategic oilfields and refineries across key regions, while U.S. sanctions pressure Lukoil to sell global assets.

raw.headline: Chevron & Exxon Eye Lukoil's Global Assets in High-Stakes Pivot
raw.summary: CVX and XOM are racing to capture strategic oilfields and refineries across key regions, while U.S. sanctions pressure Lukoil to sell global assets.

headline: Lukoil says reserves right to seek judicial protection in Bulgaria
summary: Investing.com -- Russian oil company Lukoil said Wednesday it reserves the right to seek judicial protection of its rights and legitimate interests in Bulgaria after an external manager was appointed to run its assets in the country.

raw.headline: Lukoil says reserves right to seek judicial protection in Bulgaria
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Russian oil company Lukoil said Wednesday it reserves the right to seek judicial protection of its rights and legitimate interests in Bulgaria after an external manager was appointed to run its assets in the country.

headline: Mossmorran staff going through a ‘difficult time’, says PM
summary: More than 400 jobs have been put at risk following the announcement a plant in Fife is due to close in February.

raw.headline: Mossmorran staff going through a ‘difficult time’, says PM
raw.summary: More than 400 jobs have been put at risk following the announcement a plant in Fife is due to close in February.

headline: ExxonMobil boss says ‘deliberate’ UK Government policies ‘undermining’ business
summary: Chairman Paul Greenhouse spoke out after the petrochemical firm announced plans to close the Mossmorran ethylene plant in Fife.

raw.headline: ExxonMobil boss says ‘deliberate’ UK Government policies ‘undermining’ business
raw.summary: Chairman Paul Greenhouse spoke out after the petrochemical firm announced plans to close the Mossmorran ethylene plant in Fife.

headline: Rotation From Tech Leads Investors to Dividend-Paying Stocks
summary: The result is the first sustained selloff for the group since April, with the Nasdaq 100 leading the broader market lower as investors ditch tech winners in favor of more defensive stocks.  That group, which includes old-economy stalwarts like Exxon Mobil Corp., JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Procter & Gamble Co., is often coveted when riskier stocks start to look expensive.
